Study: Viral Kinetics and Antibody Responses in Patients with COVID-19 (medRxiv)
Source / Summary: Only 5.7% plasma samples positive, blood is not a major shedding route

Study: Comparisons of nucleic acid conversion time of SARS-CoV-2 of different samples in ICU and non-ICU patients (Journal of Infection)
Source / Summary: Positive rate in blood = 87.5% (7/8) in ICU and 66.7% (16/24) in non-ICU

Study: Epidemiologic Features and Clinical Course of Patients Infected With SARS-CoV-2 in Singapore (JAMA)
Molecular and serological investigation of 2019-nCoV infected patients: implication of multiple shedding routes (Emerging Microbes & Infections)
Source / Summary: 40% (6/15) of blood samples were positive. None of the patients with viremia blood had positive oral swabs
